group.comment: Note: When changing these settings, these are not applied automatically to any currently loaded VCL! Read the README of the elgentos/magento2-varnish-extended extension on GitHub.

field.comment: Specify grace period in seconds for config file generation. If field is empty default value 300 will be saved. This grace period will be used to serve cached content when the server is healthy. If the server is not healthy, cached content will be served for 1 day before failing.

field.label: Enable Back/forward cache
field.comment: Enable Back/forward cache functionality. See web.dev for more info on bfcache.

field.label: Tracking Parameters
field.comment: Specify tracking parameters to strip off of incoming requests to increase hit rate. See the tracking query parameters registry for a list of known parameters.

field.label: Use xkey VMOD
field.comment: Varnish xkey vmod is installed. See Varnish VMOD xkey.
